chart_description: This chart displays the minor page faults per second (page faults that could be resolved with the disk cache) for different applications running on the infrastructure.

dimension_descriptions.agent_sd: The agent subdaemon associated with the node reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.apps.plugin: The application plugin reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.ebpf.plugin: The eBPF plugin reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.httpd: The Apache HTTP server reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: The Kubernetes proxy reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: The Kubernetes agent reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.logs: The log reporter reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.metrics-server: The Kubernetes server that provides resource utilization API reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The Netdata instance reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.nosql: The NoSQL database reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.other: Other miscellaneous data sources that could not be categorized.
dimension_descriptions.python.d.plugin: The Python plugin reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.sql: The SQL database reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.system: The system process reporting the data.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: The tc-qos-helper process reporting the data.
